Author: onthewaydownnn
Text: When I first got married to my husband I was just blown away he could eat and then like...move on with his life??? Like what the actual fuck??? I even found myself trying to *save him from himself* by portioning out his food or not keeping his favorite foods in the house so he didn’t overdo it and feel guilty...  ...And then I realized he doesn’t have an eating disorder and when he’s done with his favorite food he just stops eating and puts it away. Like a normal fucking adult that feeds himself and carries on.   SO CRAZY I LITETALLY CANNOT IMAGINE WHAT THAT FEELS LIKE.

Author: myanalthrowaway
Text: It's kind of like how some people absolutely need to have a spotless house at all times and other people are okay with a little mess. If undone dishes don't register high on your list of priorities or as a reflection of your value as a person, you aren't going to stress about them.
